sentences.en: Alcohol may be unsafe with medicines including common painkillers like acetaminophen or ibuprofen.
sentences.cn: 酒精可能是药物的不安全因素,后者包括常规的止痛药如退热净和布洛芬.

sentences.en: Aspirin, acetaminophen and ibuprofen can all be used to reduce pain and fever.
sentences.cn: 阿司匹林, 对乙酰氨基酚和异丁苯丙酸都可以用来减少痛苦和发烧.

sentences.en: CONCLUSION: Arginine ibuprofen syrup were bioe - quivalent with ibuprofen tablets.
sentences.cn: 结论: 精氨酸布洛芬糖浆和布洛芬片生物等效.

sentences.en: Daily use of ibuprofen can irritate the stomach.
sentences.cn: 每天服用布洛芬会刺激胃.

sentences.en: Dextromethorphan hydrobromide and ibuprofen capsules were determined by HPLC.
sentences.cn: 用HPLC测定复方胶囊中右美沙芬、布洛芬的溶出度.

sentences.en: Doctors advise taking medicines like aspirin or ibuprofen.
sentences.cn: 医生建议吃阿司匹林和消炎药.

sentences.en: Ferrous sulfate and ibuprofen are prescribed for pain.
sentences.cn: 如果腹痛服用硫酸亚铁和布洛芬.

sentences.en: Motrin and Nuprin are trademarks of brands of ibuprofen tablets.
OBJECTIVE : To probe into the current situation and developing trend of Ibuprofen in China.
sentences.cn: 目的: 了解我国布洛芬市场的现状及发展趋势.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To select formulation for ibuprofen effervescent tablets.
sentences.cn: 目的: 布洛芬泡腾片处方筛选.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To investigate the major metabolites of eugenol ibuprofen ester propionic acid.
sentences.cn: 目的研究鉴定丁香酚布洛芬酯在大鼠体内的代谢行为.

sentences.en: Researchers also looking at new uses for old drugs - trying to prevent Alzheimer's using ibuprofen, for example.
sentences.cn: 研究人员也在关注传统药物的新用途,如:他们正在试图利用布洛芬预防老年痴呆症.

sentences.en: Take medicines only with medical advice , including aspirin, acetaminophen, ibuprofen or other over - the - counter or prescribed medicines.
sentences.cn: 所以请遵医嘱服药, 包括阿斯匹林、退热净 、 布洛芬以及其他 非 处方和处方药.

sentences.en: We would recommend that ibuprofen be avoided in infants and toddlers for the management of pyrexia.
sentences.cn: 我们建议,布洛芬应避免用于婴幼儿发热的治疗.

sentences.en: Yet Gerard received no relief except for ibuprofen, a mild painkiller.
sentences.cn: 然而Gerard使用的镇痛药只有非常温和的布洛芬.

words.tran_cn: 布洛芬，异丁苯丙酸（抗炎，镇痛药）

trans.tran_en: a medicine that reduces pain, inflammation, and fever
